<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Change Subnet</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"put"} path={"/backend/api/openstack/subnets/{subnet_id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



**Host**: https://api.fotbo.com

Change a specific subnet associated with the user's VPS identified by ID.
